title: Georgiy Tsybulnikov
text:
Georgiy Tsybulnikov (born November 21, 1966) is a Russian <a href="canoe%20racing">sprint canoer</a> who competed in the 1990s. He won a bronze medal in the K-4 1000 m event at the <a href="1996%20Summer%20Olympics">1996 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Atlanta">Atlanta</a>, together with teammates <a href="Oleg%20Gorobiy">Oleg Gorobiy</a>, <a href="Sergey%20Verlin">Sergey Verlin</a> and <a href="Anatoli%20Tishchenko">Anatoli Tishchenko</a>.
Tsybulnikov also won a bronze medal in the K-4 1000 m event at the <a href="1998%20ICF%20Canoe%20Sprint%20World%20Championships">1998 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships</a> in <a href="Szeged">Szeged</a>.
